sentences: António Pinho Vargas (born Vila Nova de Gaia, August 15, 1951) is a Portuguese composer and pianist specializing in  jazz and contemporary music.
1987  As Folhas Novas Mudam de Cor
2014  Step by Step, Drumming GP plays António Pinho Vargas
